casebody.data:
PUTNAM CONSTRUCTION, LLC, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
US HOMES CORP., Defendant-Respondent. C-973 September Term 2017
080614 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 22, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005571-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
